metadata.title: CVE-2020-25866 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.6 and 3.0.0 to 3.0.13, the BLIP protocol dissector has a NULL pointer dereference because a buffer was sized for compressed (not uncompressed) messages. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/packet-blip.c by allowing reasonable compression ratios and rejecting ZIP bombs.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.7-1').
